dmca.title: [ABUSE] Hostpoints.net
dmca.body:
> -----Original Message-----
> From: abuse-bounces@lists.theplanet.com 
> [mailto:abuse-bounces@lists.theplanet.com] On Behalf Of HotFat.com
> Sent: Thursday, January 26, 2006 2:55 PM
> To: abuse@theplanet.com
> Subject: [ABUSE] Hostpoints.net
> Importance: High
> 
> abuse@theplanet.com
> 
> One of your clients <Hostpoints.net> appears to be a bad actor. They 
> are involved in hosting web sites that infringe copyrights while at 
> the same time the links on their pages to contact them return errors 
> and the <copyright@hostpoints.net> email address they provide in their 
> TOS bounces email. Nor do they have a Designated Agent on file with 
> the US Copyright Office.They clearly do not wish to be contacted 
> regarding infringement abuses from which they profit.
> 
> I have, via a web form on the hostpoints site attempted to submit a 
> Notification of Claimed Infringement (copy below). I have no way to 
> tell if the submission was successful. I am therefore calling upon you 
> for your assistance as well as notifying you of one of your customers 
> that should be reprimanded by you for the failures pointed out in the
paragraph above.
> 
> Please assist me in making sure the infringing images listed in my 
> Notification of Claimed Infringement (below) are removed and that your 
> customer abides by your TOS and makes corrects the problems listed above.
> 
> Very truly yours,
> Jay Russell
> WebMaster@HotFat.com
> 
> ======================================
> 
> Notification of Claimed Infringement
> 
> TO: copyright@hostpoints.net
> 
> This Notice of Claimed Infringement is sent to you pursuant to section
> 512(c) of the United States Copyright Act of 1976 (as amended), 17 
> U.S.C.
